p.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.38; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Beginning Monday, March 23, 2020, all Grant County School buildings (including the District Office) will be open from 8:00 am - 4:00 pm for essential business only. The doors will be locked. Those needing face-to-face assistance will need to make an appointment by calling the respective location.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap

span.span: While Non Traditional Instruction is not a new concept for Grant County teachers and students, never have we come together to create a plan for delivering instruction to our students on a day to day basis from home. What we learned through this process is that our teachers are resilient, organized, and extremely thoughtful in preparing work that is relevant for our students during this time. ...(

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap
background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap

div.span: The Grant County School District is working very hard to accommodate both the delivery of instruction and the delivery of meals during the COVID-19 period For more information regarding meals, please click here.
